actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the acceleration of educational assistance allowance payments under such chapter in certain cases.

summary.text: Authorizes the acceleration of educational assistance allowance payments to veterans whose tuition and fees for the regular academic year or comparable period of enrollment are in excess of $750, and for whom such acceleration will enable the attainment of the veteran's predetermined and identified educational objective within the entitlement period.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to authorize the acceleration of educational assistance allowance payments under such chapter in certain cases.
